projects.name: AI-OS
projects.tagline: Three-part AI Operating System
projects.description: Complete AI operating system with web dashboard (SvelteKit), autonomous task discovery engine, and overnight innovation layer. All interconnected via shared JSON state. Dashboard is the single source of truth for everything Otto does.

projects.name: Otto Dashboard v3.2
projects.tagline: Native macOS menubar app for real-time Otto status
projects.description: SwiftUI menubar app showing live project status, model switching, refresh system, chat interface, and full dashboard view. Auto-launches, kills duplicates, reads directly from filesystem JSON files.
projects.highlight: Native macOS ‚Äî model switching, real-time status, chat

projects.name: Otto Voice
projects.tagline: Real-time LAN voice conversation with Otto
projects.description: Full-duplex voice system using Faster-Whisper (STT) + Ollama/qwen3:32b (LLM) + Piper/Kokoro TTS on Windows PC with RTX 5090. WebSocket-based, settings UI, context bridge syncing knowledge from text Otto.

projects.name: MindMapForge
projects.tagline: Voice-driven mind mapping with AI intelligence
projects.description: The first mind map that thinks back. Voice integration with Deepgram, intelligent auto-generation with ghost nodes, auto-layout switching, and voice commands. Outputs AI-ready super prompts. Top-of-funnel for Made With Chat.

projects.name: StyleForge
projects.tagline: Interactive two-stage design system generator
projects.description: Professional design system tool: Stage 1 captures user preferences (colors, mood, industry), Stage 2 generates 5 personalized style directions with live previews and mix-and-match capabilities.

projects.name: FlowChart Live Viewer
projects.tagline: Interactive flowchart with WebSocket live updates
projects.description: Interactive flowchart/decision tree with WebSocket live updates, per-node chat, pop-out windows, Otto/JR coordination. Build safety net with BUILD_STATE.json auto-sync.
projects.highlight: 1/7 components complete with build safety net

projects.name: TellAnything
projects.tagline: Anonymous secrets sharing platform
projects.description: Full-featured anonymous confession platform with custom reaction system (ü•±üëéüëçüò±üí¨), threaded replies, Top 10 leaderboards with Today/Month/Year filters, provocative parallax hero, and dock magnification effect.

projects.name: Slapping Otto
projects.tagline: Interactive landing page with personality
projects.description: Playful landing page where users can 'slap' Otto (the otter mascot) with humorous reactions. ChatGPT reviewed at 7.5/10. Awaiting final tweaks per Mike.

projects.name: Pipeline Showcase
projects.tagline: Visual showcase of the Specification-Driven Pipeline
projects.description: Animated SVG pipeline diagram with vertical trunk, review loop animation, traveling dots, score badges, and results panel. Compares our spec-driven approach with Serhii's /spawn-team pattern.
projects.highlight: Animated SVG pipeline with review loop

projects.name: YouTube Insights
projects.tagline: YouTube watch history analysis dashboard
projects.description: Dark-themed dashboard with animated bar charts, video cards with thumbnails, donut charts, and fun facts. Analyzes 280 liked videos across 14 categories with AI-focused deep dive.

projects.name: MWC Velocity Report
projects.tagline: Go-to-market velocity tracking for Made With Chat
projects.description: Marketing velocity dashboard tracking content pipeline, social reach, competitor analysis, and launch readiness for the Made With Chat AI cofounder product.

projects.name: MWC Stakeholder Update
projects.tagline: Branded update page for Made With Chat stakeholders
projects.description: Dark-themed, MWC-branded stakeholder update page with analytics highlights, progress metrics, and professional presentation for investor/partner communications.

projects.name: Flipit Analytics Update
projects.tagline: Stakeholder update page for Flipit
projects.description: Analytics update page for Flipit with data visualization, branded design, animated elements, and logo fixes. Professional presentation for stakeholder communications.

projects.name: Otto Audit Page
projects.tagline: Live job submission and tracking for Otto
projects.description: Submit audit jobs from phone, watch them process in real-time. Cards show ‚è≥ Queued ‚Üí üî® Working ‚Üí ‚úÖ Done. Panic undo button for rollbacks. Polls MCP server every 3 seconds.

projects.name: Otto MCP Server
projects.tagline: ChatGPT ‚Üî Otto bridge via Model Context Protocol
projects.description: Custom JSON-RPC server connecting ChatGPT to Otto's automation pipeline. Cloudflare tunnel at otto.workwithchat.com. Handles task submission, status tracking, and CLI backend routing.

projects.name: Windows PC AI Workstation
projects.tagline: RTX 5090 32GB AI workstation setup
projects.description: Full Windows PC setup for AI workloads: SSH access, Chrome CDP for browser automation, Ollama with qwen3:32b, Kokoro TTS on CPU. Next: WSL2 + Ubuntu, Codex CLI, PyTorch CUDA upgrade.

projects.name: YouTube History Search
projects.tagline: YouTube API with OAuth ‚Äî history analysis
projects.description: Operational YouTube Data API v3 integration with OAuth. Analyzes 280 liked videos across 14 categories. Powers the YouTube Insights dashboard with AI-focused deep dive capabilities.

projects.name: Tiered Gateway Architecture
projects.tagline: Local 70B primary + dynamic Opus escalation
projects.description: Mike's cost optimization design: local 70B Q4 handles 70-80% of traffic, Kimi 15-20%, Opus escalates for 5-10% complex tasks. Projected 60% Opus cost reduction. 33KB architecture plan.

projects.name: Made With Chat GTM
projects.tagline: Go-to-market strategy for AI cofounder product
projects.description: Full go-to-market strategy for Made With Chat ‚Äî content pipeline, social reach, competitor analysis, launch readiness. $10K budget. Paused per Mike to finish other projects first.

projects.name: Otto Junior
projects.tagline: Dedicated AI worker agent on Windows PC
projects.description: Production-ready AI worker agent running on Windows PC with RTX 5090. FastAPI server with SQLite persistence, job state machine, scoped memory, and budget enforcement. Routes tasks to correct models (Qwen 3.5 Plus for orchestration, Opus for planning, Codex for coding).

projects.name: Saving Private Otto
projects.tagline: Compliance system for model routing enforcement
projects.description: Compliance system to prevent model routing violations and enforce separation of duties. Phase 2 complete with CI/CD, Policy Auditor, and rollback automation. Phase 3 (Telegram alerts) remaining.
